metadata.title: CVE-2021-46917 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:dmaengine: idxd: fix wq cleanup of WQCFG registers A pre-release siliconerratum workaround where wq reset does not clear WQCFG registers was leakedinto upstream code. Use wq reset command instead of blasting the MMIOregion. This also address an issue where we clobber registers in futuredevices.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
